text.section:
Unless an order for a temporary variance from a regulation or part of a regulation is renewed as provided in this section, the order may not be in effect for longer than:
1 year after the order is passed; or
if shorter, the period that the employer needs to achieve compliance with the regulation or part.

section.section: Subject to the limitations in this subsection, the Commissioner may renew an order for a temporary variance twice.

The Commissioner may renew an order under this subsection only if the employer:
submits an application for renewal to the Commissioner at least 90 days before the date on which the order is to expire; and
meets the requirements of this subtitle for granting a temporary variance.
A renewal under this subsection may not remain in effect for more than 180 days.
